mapper.insert: insert into employee values(#{empId}, #{empPwd}, sysdate, #{empName}, #{phone}, #{empBirth}, #{email} , #{address},#{salary},#{profile}, #{enrollDate},null,null,sysdate, #{jobId}, #{posId}, #{depId}, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from employee left join job using(JOB_ID) left join position using(POS_ID) left join department using(DEP_ID) where emp_id = #{ empId }
select * from (select rownum rnum, sub.* from (select * from employee where emp_id = #{ empId }) sub ) left join department using(dep_id) left join job using(JOB_ID) left join position using(pos_id)
select count(EMP_ID) from employee where EMP_ID = #{ eid }
select count(*) from employee left join department using(dep_id) where DEP_NAME like '%' || #{ keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from employee where EMP_NAME like '%' || #{ keyword} || '%'
